effect.shortEffect: Cud Chew causes the Pokémon to reuse an already consumed Berry at the end of the next turn.
effect.full: Cud Chew causes the Pokémon to reuse an already consumed Berry at the end of the next turn.

description.scarlet-violet: When the Pokémon eats a Berry, it will regurgitate that Berry at the end of the next turn and eat it one more time.
